-e ---

Transparent ubiquitous noun suffix

-ον -on often interchangeable with -os -us

Confusion of grammatic functions: singular "one" plural 𓈖 cases…

𒍽𒉿𒆷𒀭 lakpilan; lak-pi-la-an la'kapilaⁿ *kaballoˢ capall cavallu cheval 𓃗 ⋍ 𒍽 ḪUŠ pilān Horse pålle polle

UM 𒌝 Akkadian transparent noun suffix
-𒌝 -um ⇔ -on -ma -𒈨 me @ Elamite
